C.A. (PHC) 1900: In the instant appeal, the Appellants have failed to support any of
the  aforesaid  grounds.  Therefore,  I  do  not  see  any  merit  to  grant
the reliefs claimed by the Appellants.
In view of the aforesaid facts, I dismiss the petition of appeal dated
14th March 2018 subject to tax cost payable to the Respondents.
Judge of the Court of Appeal

column1: M Sampath K. B. Wijeratne, J. (CA)
